title: If-Else
description: Write a program to accept age from user and print whether person is eligible for voting or not. Print 'Eligible for voting' if user enters age greater than or equal to 18. If user enters age less than 18, print message 'Not eligible for voting'

title: Switch Case
description: Write a program to accept character from user. Print 'vowel' if character entered by user is vowel (i.e. one of A, E, I, O, U, a, e, i, o, u). Print 'consonant' if character is consonant. Print 'digit' if character is digit. Print 'symbol' if character is not alphanumeric

title: Checking for Vowel
description: Write a program to check if character in input is Vowel or not. If Character is vowel, print 'vowel'. If character is not vowel, print 'Not vowel'

title: Reversing Case of Character
description: Write a program to reverse Case of Character. e.g. if user enters character 'A', output should be 'a' and vice versa

title: Swapping Two Numbers
description: Write a program to accept two integers from user. Store them in 2 variables. Swap contents of 2 variables

title: Arithmetic operations on provided floating point numbers
description: Write a program to accept 2 floating point numbers from user. Accept symbol from user. User can enter one of symbols like '+' ,'-', '*', '/'. Based on symbol entered by user, perform operation and print result
